name: House of Jason Online Trivia | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who arrived at the shore of Crystal Lake as Alice was pulled under by Jason in "Friday the 13th"?
questions.explanation:
The police.

	Alice had been playing strip Monopoly with Bill Brown (Harry Crosby) when she noticed it was raining and decided to go back to her cabin.  After the rainstorm died down, Alice and Bill noticed that no one else was around.  They didn't know that people at Camp Crystal Lake had been getting murdered all day long. Later, after finding Bill's body, Alice ran to Mrs. Voorhees, who told Alice that her son Jason had drowned at Crystal Lake because the camp counselors weren't paying any attention, and the current camp should've never been reopened.  She tried to kill Alice, but Alice chopped off her head. The next morning Alice awoke floating in a canoe on Crystal Lake.  She saw the police waving at her as Jason, looking like a corpse, jumped out of the water and pulled Alice into the lake.

questions.text: What was the name of Terry's dog in "Friday the 13th Part 2"?
questions.explanation:
Muffin.

	The people at the training camp for camp counselors noticed the remains of a dead dog, and thought it could have been Terry's dog, Muffin, but they decided not to tell Terry.  That night Terry stayed behind at the camp in case Muffin showed up.  Meanwhile, Ginny (Amy Steel) told her friends that maybe Jason didn't drown all those years ago. Maybe he lived by himself in the woods, but he happened to see his mother get decapitated in the previous movie.  He could be an "out-of-control psychopath".  Meanwhile, the man in the wheelchair got a machete to the head. Later, Ginny was chased by Jason, and ran into Jason's cabin, where she saw the head of Pamela Voorhees (Betsy Palmer).  Ginny's boyfriend showed up and they fought Jason and ran away. Later, they were in a cabin when they heard a sound at the door.  The door was opened.  Muffin was there, still alive, wagging its tail.  Then Jason crashed through the window and grabbed Ginny!

questions.text: Who hit Jason with an ax in "Friday the 13th Part III"?
questions.explanation:
Chris.

	Chris went to her family farm with some friends after having been away.  Eventually, she told her boyfriend in the woods that she went away because a man with an ugly face had attacked her one night.  By the time they returned to the farm, all her friends had been killed by Jason, who had killed a silly man wearing a hockey mask, so Jason decided to wear the mask from then on.  After making her boyfriend's eyes pop out, Jason chased Chris, who ran away from Jason to the barn.  When Jason came after her, she swung an ax into his head.

questions.text: What comedian played the first man Jason killed in "Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter"?
questions.explanation:
Bruce Mahler.

	In 1984, Bruce Mahler (comedian, "Fridays", "Seinfeld", "Hook") played the clumsy policeman, Fackler, in "Police Academy".  He also played Axel, who worked at the hospital and was in the room with Jason Voorhees, whom people thought was dead.  Jason woke up and killed him, after clips of previous movie murders were shown.  It so happened a boy named Tommy lived at Crystal Lake with his dog, Gordon, when Jason decided to go back and murder everyone at Crystal Lake.  When Jason came after Tommy, Tommy swung a machete into Jason's head.

questions.text: What character was played by John Shepherd and Corey Feldman in "Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning"?
questions.explanation:
Tommy Jarvis.

	At the beginning of "Friday the 13th: A New Beginning", Tommy Jarvis (Corey Feldman), who had killed Jason Voorhees in "Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter", watched two men dig up Jason, who was still holding a machete.  Jason killed the two men and walked up to Tommy, but it was just a dream.  The adult Tommy (John Shepherd) woke up on the way to the halfway house for young mental patients.  Later, Roy Burns (Dick Wieand) went nuts and killed almost everybody after his secret son, Joey, was killed with an ax by Vic.

questions.text: What brought Jason back to life in "Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives"?
questions.explanation:
Electricity.

	Tommy Jarvis and his friend went to Jason's grave to burn Jason's body.  Tommy dug up the grave and shoved a metal fence post into Jason.  A thunderstorm began and lightning struck the fence post.  Electricity hit Jason's body, bringing him back to life!  Later, the gravedigger refilled the grave so he wouldn't get into trouble, saying, "Why'd they have to dig up ol' Jason?  Some people have a funny idea of entertainment!"  Of course, the movie involved Jason killing various people on the way to Crystal Lake, which had been given a different name by the townspeople.

questions.text: Who accidentally used her powers to bring Jason back to life in "Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood"?
questions.explanation:
Tina Shepard.

	Years earlier Tina had wished her father was dead after her parents had an argument.  Her father was standing on the boat dock when it shook and collapsed, and he fell into Crystal Lake.  At first her doctor thought she was a silly child who blamed herself for wishing harm on people, but then he realized she did have strange powers. It looked like the authorities never brought any bodies out of Crystal Lake, because Tina's father was still in there, and so was Jason.  When she wished her father would come back to life, Jason popped up instead, murdering people at the lake, in the woods, and in their houses throughout the movie.

questions.text: What was the name of the ship in "Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan"?
questions.explanation:
Lazarus.

	Underwater cables got tangled up with Jason's body, which was again at the bottom of Crystal Lake.  The cables electrocuted Jason's corpse when a boat's anchor pulled the cables.  This caused Jason to become resurrected again.  He killed people in a boat, which floated to the SS Lazarus, named for the man who got resurrected by Jesus in the New Testament.  Jason climbed on board, unnoticed by the graduating class who were taking a cruise to New York City.  Of course, Jason killed almost everyone on the Lazarus, except for Rennie, her boyfriend, and her dog, Toby.

questions.text: What did the coroner eat which made him possessed by Jason in "Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday"?
questions.explanation:
Jason's heart.

	In one of the most ridiculous movies ever made, Jason got blown up.  When the coroner looked at Jason's parts, Jason's heart continued beating.  The coroner grabbed the heart and began eating it!  Then he ran around murdering people until someone else got possessed.  There was a restaurant which served hamburger patties shaped like hockey masks for tourists who wanted to see the town where Jason used to live.  Diana Kimble (Erin Gray) became invaded by a little monster and became Jason, the large man in a hockey mask.

questions.text: What director played Dr. Wimmer who was killed by Jason in "Jason X"?
questions.explanation:
David Cronenberg.

	At the beginning of the movie Jason had been captured by the military.  When Dr. Wimmer (David Cronenberg, director of "Rabid", "The Brood", "The Fly", "Scanners", "Videodrome", and "The Dead Zone") went to have a look at Jason, he found out Jason had escaped.  Jason killed him and stabbed a woman, but Jason and the woman were frozen to prevent Jason from escaping. In 2455, students visited Earth after everyone had moved to Earth Two because the Earth was too polluted.  They found the frozen Jason and the frozen injured woman.  Their bodies were taken to the spaceship Grendel where they were defrosted. Jason continued his old habit of killing people.
